programDetails.name: CONTOSO Shipping
programDetails.description: CONTOSO Shipping program that will send shipping notification messages

messageDetails.helpAnswerToUser: This is the HELP message test.
messageDetails.optOutAnswerToUser: This is the STOP message test.
messageDetails.optInMessageToUser: CONTOSO Shipping - To confirm your subscription with us, please reply 'Y', and you will be added to our list.
messageDetails.optInConfirmationMessageToUser: CONTOSO Shipping - Welcome message to CONTOSO Shipping. Messaging & data rates may apply.For help, reply "HELP" or call/email customercare@contoso.comTo unsubscribe, reply "STOP". Visit our terms and conditions at https://www.contoso.com/shipping/termsofservice.

messages.text: Want me to notify you when package in the way?

trafficDetails.spikeDetails: Higher traffic expected during holiday season and Black Friday.

messageDetails.helpAnswerToUser: Send 'Stop' to unsubscribe, send 'Start' to resubscribe.
messageDetails.optOutAnswerToUser: You've been unsubscribed from these messages.  Send 'Start' if you want to resubscribe.
messageDetails.optInMessageToUser: Someone requested to subscribe this number to receive updates about Contoso's loyalty program.  To confirm subscription, reply to this message with 'JOIN'
messageDetails.optInConfirmationMessageToUser: Congrats, you have been successfully subscribed to loyalty program updates.  Welcome!

trafficDetails.spikeDetails: Higher traffic expected around major shopping holidays, most notably Black Friday and Memorial Day.
